title: The Finale of ‘We Own This City’ With Showrunner George Pelecanos
description:
Chris and Andy are joined by George Pelecanos, the showrunner for ‘We Own This City,’ to talk about why he felt compelled to tell this story and return to the setting of Baltimore (9:34), Jon Bernthal’s performance as Wayne Jenkins (36:02), and the final episode of the series (46:29).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: George Pelecanos
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
